title: Bug 18285 - Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
OB: When double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
EB: In Build 20020528, double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline should open the editor on the unit hosting the import reference.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the package view outline.
2. Locate a type import statement.
3. Double-click on the type import statement.
Expected: The editor should open on the unit hosting the import reference.
Observed: The editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
